title: Field Remedy: 1684
subject:
Cheater seal - Water ingress around door
mirror area
complaint:
Water ingress around door mirror area into
vehicle.
cause:
Inefficient sealing around the door mirror
area.
production:
As of VIN W0L0EBR973N007089 a new modified
cheater seal has been introduced in production.

remedyContent.text:
In case of customer complaint replace the old cheater seal
against the new improved cheater seal.
